permissions: Allowed if the user is authorized to create the associated tender per TenderPolicy (TenderCancellationPolicy -> TenderOfferPolicy#create? delegates to TenderPolicy#create? for the tender).
side_effects: Creates a tender cancellation action that sets the tender status to cancelled. Cancels related tender job schedule shifts, may cascade cancellations to related broker/customer tenders, and may send cancellation notifications.
validation_notes: --tender is required. Tender ID is parsed as an integer. Tender must be in an allowed status (offered, accepted, or editing; additional statuses may be allowed when internal flags permit). Tender cannot have associated time cards or material transactions.
